Building Leadership Team Presents Continuous Learning Plans

div.p: We want to extend much praise to all the Administrative Professional in our USD on 04/22 as Admin Professionals Day! We’d be lost with out you as you make #KidsFirst407 ☺️💐
The BOE will be holding their regular monthly meeting on Monday - 4/20 at 5:30 PM. Follow the link to see the full agenda: https://5il.co/f68b

This evening 04/10, @ 8:20 (20:20), RHS will join the movement across the country to honor the Class of 2020 by turning on Shaffer Stadium lights for 20 minutes
We're proud of you so we choose to show it! #KidsFirst407. Join us & let’s see your porch lights on too ☺️
We wanted to post this so that people will understand our purpose & not be alarmed or think something might be wrong.
USD 407 BOE will be holding a special meeting on Monday - 4/13 @ 5:30 PM. Follow this link to review the full agenda: https://5il.co/exp6
Due to potential icy roads overnight & Friday morning, NO GRAB N GO MEALS will be available from USD 407 on Friday, 04/03.
